titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CRITICAL CARE ADMISSION TYPE - Description

div.p: An indication of whether a CRITICAL CARE PERIOD was initiated as a result of a non-emergency treatment plan, for example, for elective major surgery. This relates only to the period of critical care and not to the nature of the hospital admission. For example, a planned hospital admission may unexpectedly require an emergency intensive care unit admission, in which case the classification will be National Code '01'.
